channel.title: :mad:---------->HeLp!<------------
channel.description:
I really need help, im trying to play trail to hell V2 And I download the cliet, but when I click run in the folder is says:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file At java.lang.classloader.defineclass1(native method) At java.lang.classloader.defineclass(Unknown Source) at java.secrity.secureClassLoader.defineclass(unknown source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknow Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(unknown source) at java.security.accessController.doprivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findclass(unknown source) at sun.misc.launcher$appclassloader.loadclass(unknown source) at java.lang.classloader.loadclass(unknown source) at java.lang.classloader.loadclassinternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
So when I press any key it closes. IF I NEED TO DOWNLOAD ANYTHING TO HELP THIS ERROR CAN YOU PLEASE POST THE LINK TO DOWNLOAD IT AT OR ATLEAST TELL ME WHAT I NEEDA DOWNLOAD? PLEASE AND THANK YOU I WANT THIS ERROR FIXED VERY BAD!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :( :( :( :( :( :(

item.title: :mad:---------->HeLp!<------------
item.dc:creator: @Erith Erith
item.description:
@Erith wrote:

Why, but why do I get this error, it happens for every client I DL HELP PLEASE!! :MAD::MAD:
Oh and owned it diden’t work…
Oh and can it might be i needa re-download java? or get a new one?

item.title: :mad:---------->HeLp!<------------
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

that error means that you client.class file is corrupt.

you need to completely redo your client.java and then compile

suggestion – get a new server

Read full topic
